name: UNRUSH
description:
Help Chhama find his grandson.


Old man Chhama has lost his grandson. Can you help him escape from the perils of his enemies?
The only power available is slowing down (UNRUSH).
UNRUSH and pass through tricky pathways, fight bosses and solve puzzles to unfold the mystery!


UNRUSH is a Solo Developed and Designed 2-D puzzle platformer.
The objective of the game is to solve puzzles, fight bosses and pass through tricky pathways in order to proceed.

Features

  • Play as old man Chhama and his grandson.
  • Slow down the protagonist to solve puzzles and proceed in the game.
  • 35 levels, each level containing multiple puzzles.
  • The puzzles range from easy to hard and require critical thinking.
  • Hand-crafted Artwork
  • Original soundtracks that set the mood
  • The game has almost no text and can be enjoyed by players of all languages.
